comment._content: At the top of the page in pencil is written Paardeberg. This was the scene of a Boer War battle. The Battle of Paardeberg or Perdeberg ("Horse Mountain") was a major battle during the Second Anglo-Boer War. It was fought near Paardeberg Drift on the banks of the Modder River in the Orange Free State near Kimberley. (From Wikipedia)
